org.gearvrf.io

Interface CursorControllerListener


  • public interface CursorControllerListener
    Add a CursorControllerListener to the GVRInputManager to receive notifications whenever a GVRCursorController is added or removed from the system at runtime.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCursorControllerAdded(GVRCursorController controller)
      Called when a GVRCursorController is added to the system.
      void onCursorControllerRemoved(GVRCursorController controller)
      Called when the GVRCursorController previously added has been removed.

    • Method Detail

      • onCursorControllerAdded

        void onCursorControllerAdded(GVRCursorController controller)
        Called when a GVRCursorController is added to the system. Use GVRCursorController.getId() to uniquely identify the GVRCursorController and use GVRCursorController.getControllerType() to know its GVRControllerType.
        Parameters:
        controller - the GVRCursorController added.

      • onCursorControllerRemoved

        void onCursorControllerRemoved(GVRCursorController controller)
        Called when the GVRCursorController previously added has been removed. Use GVRCursorController.getId() to uniquely identify the GVRCursorController and GVRCursorController.getControllerType() to know its GVRControllerType.
        Parameters:
        controller - the GVRCursorController removed.
